guide: Use the best fishing rod, bait and armor that you
have access to and fish in The Park during rain.
Recommended is a Chum Rod with Angler Armor and Fish Bait.
You will gain progress on this by going for
the farming collection goals. Garden Milestones
will be a decent help here.
Kill Team Treasurite members in the Crystal Hollows.
They spawn in the Mithril Deposits and you will need
Heart of the Mountain 4 to go there.
Do your daily mining commissions.
A higher level Bingo Pet will benefit you here.
You will need Combat 12 for this.
Getting a Void Sword and Ender Armor
will make progress in this easier.

note: Find 1 pair in the Experimentation table
guide: Get Enchanting Level 10 and play
the first tier in the Experimentation Table.
Mine Pure Diamonds in the Dwarven Mines
with a Fortune 3+ pickaxe. You can also
use Diamond Spreadings and Compactors
in your minions to gain passive progress.
Do 3 Tier 1 Revenant Horror Bosses
and claim the rewards by talking to Maddox.
Complete a Floor 1 with a score of 270+
and buy the chest afterwards. If you can't buy
it on the spot, either save money and buy it
from Croesus within the next 2 days or do another run.
You will probably need help with this.
For this you should utilize the Garden.
Melons will unlock at Garden Level 6, so do
Sugar Cane Collector and Potatorific before this.
Use the Gardening Axe and its upgrade once you
unlock Melons. You might want to save some copper
to enchant the axe with Sunder.
For this you should utilize the Garden.
Sugar Cane will unlock at Garden Level 5, so do
Potatorific before this. Use the Gardening Hoe
and its upgrade for this.

note: Kill 25 Goblins during a Goblin Raid
guide: Kill Goblins in the Goblin Burrows (-100 163 150)
while an event is going on.
You need Mining Level 12 to visit the required island.
Buy a common Bee from Bea (4999 coins, 2 Blocks
of Gold and Coal) and upgrade it with Kat.
This is gonna cost 10k coins and 128 Coalblocks
and take 1 hour to complete.
Buy a Raider Axe for 130k coins
from the Melancholic Viking in The Park.
Remember: Level 1 Enchantments do count.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Costs 256 Enchanted Oak Wood to craft and
unlocks at Oak Wood Collection 9 (30k).
Use Diaz' 10x daily shop limit for this.
Use the wiki to figure out what Fetchur asks for.
You will need to get into Dwarven Mines to be
able to even talk to him.
You will most likely get this passively.
Use /be ingame to view your progress once you
talked to Bramass Beastslayer in The Spiders Den.
Craft Leather, Iron, Gold and Diamond Armor
Collect Ender Armor from The End (8 pieces including equipment)
Craft Leaflet, Farm Suit, Mushroom and Cactus Armor
Buy Squire, Rosetta's, Celeste and Starlight Armor from Rosetta
Claim your cake buff (visit skyerzz, nightlibra or prtl),
hold an angler 4+ rod and visit someone with a
Sea Creature Chance beacon (visit PrincessVictra or ReyMaratov).
You can find Relic Coordinates in Skytils or the Wiki.
You will need Ender Pearls to reach some of them.
For this you should utilize the Garden.
Potato will unlock at Garden Level 3.
Use the Gardening Hoe and its upgrade for this.
The recipe will unlock at Potato Collection VIII
(craft with 3 paper and 1 Enchanted Baked Potato)
Follow the Lone Adventurer Questline
in the End until he asks you to kill
Watchers to get the Dragon Shortbow.
Reforge your Void Sword to Sharp
at the Blacksmith in the Hub or
enchant any weapon with Critical 5 (50 Levels).
You will get this passively because you need
higher combat levels for other goals.
You should use the combat xp rewards from
the Bestiary to help with this.
Use the best fishing rod, bait and armor that you
have access to and fish in The Park during rain.
Recommended is a Chum Rod with Angler Armor and Carrot Bait.
You will need Fishing 15 to be able to fish him up.
Place Fishing Minions and give them the best storage
(and fuel) you have access to.
